meanings.definition: The dried stigmas of the crocus flower, used as a spice.
meanings.sent1: In the recipe, a pinch of saffrons adds a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent2: The saffrons were carefully measured out to enhance the aroma of the curry.

meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like saffrons, spreading warmth and joy around the room.
meanings.sent5: The saffrons shimmered like tiny drops of sunshine in the spice cabinet.
